comment.text: Provides the fix for CVE-2021-3872 as well.

bugs.title: CVE-2021-3778 vim: heap-based buffer overflow in utf_ptr2char() in mbyte.c

bugzilla.short_desc: CVE-2021-3778 vim: heap-based buffer overflow in utf_ptr2char() in mbyte.c

long_desc.thetext:
vim is vulnerable to Heap-based Buffer Overflow.

Reference:
https://huntr.dev/bounties/d9c17308-2c99-4f9f-a706-f7f72c24c273

Upstream patch:
https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/65b605665997fad54ef39a93199e305af2fe4d7f

This issue has been addressed in the following products:

  Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8

Via RHSA-2021:4517 https://access.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2021:4517

This bug is now closed. Further updates for individual products will be reflected on the CVE page(s):

https://access.redhat.com/security/cve/cve-2021-3778

comment.text: Provides the fix for CVE-2021-3872 as well.
